column4: Edimax isl isted on the bots page not sure if it is your model though.
you will have to look yourself really, personally since usb wifi is cheap I would get one that works out of the box.
about 300 or more linux distros though, the bots page gives a list of ones that work that one is not there.
does not mean you can't get it to but your hill to climb really. :)
